name: An Ancient Tale of Power
description:
The Pyramids of Giza were once covered in a white casing made of glimmering limestone and other ancient materials. It was so polished that it would reflect the sun rays and would act like gigantic mirrors that reflect light so powerful it would be visible from the moon as a shining star on earth. Legend says, this white casing was more than just for show.

As an archeologist and a detective of stolen artifacts, you are on a mission to find King Khufu's sacred Scarabs that are made of that white casing that once covered the pyramids and uncover their mystery...
